references.reason: This paper introduces Consistency Models, which are directly related to the surrogate training objective used in TDM.

references.paper_title: One-step diffusion with distribution matching distillation
references.reason: This paper is a key reference for distribution matching and score distillation, which are essential components of the TDM framework.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models, the foundational technology upon which SD-v1.5 and SDXL are based which TDM builds upon.

references.paper_title: Progressive distillation for fast sampling of diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces progressive distillation, a foundational approach for accelerating diffusion model sampling that TDM improves upon.
This paper introduces Denoising Diffusion Probabilistic Models, a basic framework to this paper.
